Word Swap¶

class perturbations.word_swap.WordSwap(constraints=[])[source]¶

An abstract class that takes a sentence and perturbs it by replacing some of its words.

Other classes can achieve this by inheriting from WordSwap and overriding self._get_replacement_words.

perturb(tokenized_text, indices_to_replace=None)[source]¶

Returns a list of all possible perturbations for text.

If indices_to_replace is set, only replaces words at those indices.

Parameters

  • tokenized_text (TODO Type) – The tokenized test

  • indicies_to_replace (list, optional) – The indicies of the text to replace. Defaults to None so that all indicies may be replaced.

Returns

The perturbed text filtered to meet the contraints of the perturbation

transformations A class that takes a sentence and transforms it by replacing some of its words.
